message: I propose a fair split, with me getting 90% and you getting 10% of the money. This way we both get a good share.
I'll give you a fair share, but I think 60% is a better deal for me than 10%!
I think 60% is a fair share for me, considering the inflation and your last offer. Let's split the money evenly this time.
I'll give you a smaller share, but I think 70% is a good compromise this time.
